# LLMs TXT Generator

> A Node.js tool for generating `llms.txt` and `llms-full.txt` files, providing standardized documentation formats for AI models to better understand project structures.

## Core Documentation
- [README.md](README.md): Project overview, installation instructions, usage examples, and development setup
- [index.ts](src/index.ts): Main entry point for the library, exports core functionality
- [server-for-llms.ts](src/mcp/server-for-llms.ts): MCP server implementation with tools for file operations
- [generate.ts](src/llm/prompts/generate.ts): Contains prompt templates for generating documentation files

## Optional Content
- [package.json](package.json): Project dependencies and configuration
- [tsconfig.json](tsconfig.json): TypeScript configuration
- [jest.config.js](jest.config.js): Testing configuration
